Summary: Shaft of light coming from broad baseline in sky
divs: sighting detailslocation: lancaster, pa -- backyard fireplace the light drew our attention first. action\motion: slow and consistent emotions\reactions: thought it was a police helicopter, but then realized it was much larger and without any sound. we only saw it for about eight seconds, but it appeared as a veil of light descending several-hundred feet from the sky. the light intensity was not powerful at first glance, but the source was consistent and appeared to be from a broad base (see sketch), versus a single spotlight. there were no mechanical sounds to be heard, although we thought we could hear what we believed to be a single, high-pitched, long blast sound from an air balloon. after eight seconds it quickly faded.
